title: Shan T Lao Fu Zi (Old Master Q & "San-T")
synopsis: Third animated movie of Old Master Q. Old Man Q, Big Potato and Mr. Chin work at a lunapark and encounter a series of unlucky events. To acquire the land of the lunapark, the director of the Landlord Company threatens to demolish the lunapark with a bomb. By a chance, Old Man Q meets an alien called Shan T and they become friends. Shan T then helps Old Man Q to fight against Landlord Company henchmen.
related_anime: ['Lao Fu Zi Shui Hu Chuan', 'Old Master Q', 'Lao Fu Zi Fan Dou Zhen Tan']
